itinerary.mapNote: Below Humantay Lake. Salkantay glacier first views. 3900m.
After Salkantay Pass 4630m. Cloud forest entry. 2900m.
Coffee and coca plantations. Subtropical cloud forest. 2650m.
Machu Picchu Pueblo. Hot springs town. Last night. 2040m.
Citadel visit. Bus up, train to Cusco. 2430m.

waypoints.name: Salkantay Summit
waypoints.note: 'Savage Mountain' of Peru. Apu spirit. Glacier visible from pass.

waypoints.name: Salkantay Pass
waypoints.note: Trek highpoint. Glaciated. Often windy and cold even in dry season.

waypoints.name: Humantay Lake
waypoints.note: Glacial turquoise lake. 2hr detour from Day 1 camp. Sacred.

waypoints.name: Salkantay Glacier
waypoints.note: Active glacier on Salkantay's south face. Visible from pass.

waypoints.name: Aguas Calientes
waypoints.note: Machu Picchu Pueblo. Train station. Hot springs pool.
